my_business: Insurance Saathi, led by Sreenivasula Gupta, is a leading insurance agency with 11+ years of proven expertise in delivering end-to-end insurance solutions. With a team of 60+ experienced insurance advisors, we serve over 5,000+ clients across Telangana and Andhra Pradesh. We specialize in Health Insurance, Life Insurance, SME Insurance, Motor Insurance, Marine Insurance, and Travel Insurance, partnering with all major insurance companies in India. Our client-centric approach ensures customised risk management, claims support, and policy servicing. Trusted by businesses and individuals alike, Insurance Saathi (iSaathi) is your one-stop destination for comprehensive insurance services and long-term financial protection.
top_product: Group Health Insurance for Businesses, Critical Illness Coverage, Whole Life Insurance, Child Education and Savings Plans, Business Interruption Insurance, Liability Insurance (Professional Indemnity, Public Liability), Cyber Insurance, Comprehensive Car Insurance, Cargo and Freight Insurance, Medical Emergency Coverage Abroad
ideal_referral: Small and Medium Business Owners, Vehicle Owners and Frequent Travellers, Working Professionals and Families.
top_problem_solved: Complexity in Choosing the Right Insurance Many clients struggle to understand which insurance policies truly fit their needs. Insurance Saathi simplifies this by offering personalised, expert advice that cuts through jargon and confusion, ensuring clients get optimal coverage without overpaying. Delayed or Complicated Claims Process Clients often face challenges during insurance claims, including delays and lack of transparency. Insurance Saathi provides dedicated claims support and guidance, making the process smooth, faster, and hassle free worked by 4 professional claims team members (employees of Insurance Saathi)..
my_favourite_bni_story: A simple referral received in my early days through BNI turned into a lifelong client relationship when I helped a family secure the right insurance after years of uncertainty. It showed me that genuine connections here don’t just build business, they change lives.
